page.title: 02A Typical Day.
page.content: { Monday}is a typical day for me. I feel terrible getting up on the first day of the week.As soon as I'm ready, I set off for school. When my teacher has taken the register we line up and go to {assembly.}After assembly we have hymn {practice.}All the teachers leave except for the music teacher and one other teacher who walks around listening to our beautiful singing. When we return to our class we have {maths.}until first break. Break lasts for 15 minutes and after the bell we get changed for{P.E.}Dinner is at 12 o'clock and then we play until 1.15 p.m. Our last playtime is at 2.15 p.m. At the end of the day we have{athletics}until 4.30p.m. When I get home I have tea and get changed. Then I go to{Allensmore Farm for{table-tennis coaching.
